about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of > includes 20 high-quality tracks, comprising 16 tracks from the software and additional 4 exclusive tracks exclusive from the software.

The music pack offers both MP3 and OGG versions of each track. The OGG versions can be directly added to the software for use. Unlike the compressed 22k versions used in the software, this music pack features 44k high quality tracks.
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of > includes 20 high-quality tracks, comprising 16 tracks from the software and additional 4 exclusive tracks exclusive from the software.

The music pack offers both MP3 and OGG versions of each track. The OGG versions can be directly added to the software for use. Unlike the compressed 22k versions used in the software, this music pack features 44k high quality tracks.
name: Pixel Game Engine Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 200 MB available space

short_description: This is an add-on content for > and does not include the software.
